rules.description: Forbid sensitive information and secrets in the image metadata

Check the documentation to learn why and how to change the default image user

rules.description: Forbid the use of package manager instructions (eg. apk, npm, rpm, etc)
Severity greater than or equal high
Image is older than 30 days or Creation date is not present
Fixable AND
Variable AZURE_CLIENT_SECRET exists
Forbid sensitive information and secrets in the image metadata
Severity equal critical AND Fixable
Severity equal high AND Fixable since 30 days
Severity greater than or equal high AND Network attack vector AND Fixable
Severity equal critical AND Fixable
Severity equal high AND Fixable since 30 days
Severity greater than or equal high AND Network attack vector AND Fixable
